Package fr.sorbonne_u.sylalexcenter.performancecontroller.interfaces

Interface PerformanceControllerServicesI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentServiceI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedI, java.rmi.Remote, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PerformanceControllerServicesConnector, PerformanceControllerServicesInboundPort, PerformanceControllerServicesOutboundPort
    public interface PerformanceControllerServicesI
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredI
    The interface PerformanceControllerServicesI defines the methods used by the performance controller component in order to communicate with the admission controller when an AVM is added or removed, or when cores are added or removed.
    Author:
    Alexandra Tudor, Sylia Righi

    • Method Summary
